title: wine_Paul_Hobbs_2009_Beckstoffer_To_Kalon_Vineyard_Cabernet_Sauvignon_(Oakville)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 58358.
country: US.
description: This is a pinnacle of the modern style of winemaking in Napa Valley. The tannins are strong but not aggressive. The acidity is just enough to provide balance for the tremendously rich blackberry, black currant, Kahlua and olive flavors. The oak is powerful, but the wine wears it easily. The finish is thoroughly dry, long and spicy. And although the alcohol is high, it's not impossible. You can drink it now, although the tannins could benefit from 6â€“8 years in the cellar..
designation: Beckstoffer To Kalon Vineyard.
